mapper.select: SELECT d.id, d.full_name, d.experience_years, d.work_location, GROUP_CONCAT(distinct dg.degree_name) AS degree_name, GROUP_CONCAT(distinct s.specialization_name) AS specialization_name FROM doctors d LEFT JOIN doctor_degrees dd ON d.id = dd.doctor_id LEFT JOIN degrees dg ON dd.degree_id = dg.degree_id LEFT JOIN doctor_specializations ds ON d.id = ds.doctor_id LEFT JOIN specializations s ON ds.specialization_id = s.specialization_id WHERE d.id = #{id} GROUP BY d.id
